title: Cherry pick some fixes for buffer overflow bugs
body:
**Description of Change**

Fix for some overflow bugs:

 - https://github.com/google/skia/commit/07afa23bd0fa74d18fb7faee898b2a876536a170
 - https://github.com/google/skia/commit/68825776f4b4226dde4bbe13b07077e9448a9a3b

**Bugs Fixed**

None.

**API Changes**

None.

**Behavioral Changes**

Decoding certain image should no longer overflow.

**PR Checklist**

- [ ] Has tests (if omitted, state reason in description)
- [ ] Rebased on top of master at time of PR
- [ ] Changes adhere to coding standard
- [ ] Updated documentation
